summary: Set in Edwardian England where upper lips are always stiff and men from the Colonies are not entirely to be trusted, Fisk Senior has little time or affection for his son, but when the pair visit an eccentric Indian, they start a strange journey that eventually allows the old man to find his heart.
cast: Jeremy Northam|Sam Neill|Bryan Brown|Peter O'Toole|Judy Parfitt|Art Malik|Ramon Tikaram|Xavier Horan|Barbara Wilshere|Angela Clerkin|Dudley Sutton|Shaughan Seymour|Charlotte Graham|Haydon Downing|Miriama McDowell|Bruce Hopkins|Elizabeth Goram-Smith|Nick Shaw
keywords: club the organization|equestrian|pet owner relationship|elderly man|briton
title: Dean Spanley
